name: HealthEData_1Sandbox
title: Health eData 1 Sandbox
description: This is a Healthedata1 sandbox for creation of resources and examples

resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the Condition resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve problems and health concerns information.
resource.name: US Core Condition Profile

resource.description: The US Core Encounter Diagnosis Profile is based upon the core FHIR Condition Resource and meets the  U.S. Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) v2 'Encounter Diagnosis' requirements.  It defines constraints and extensions on the Condition resource for the minimal set of data to record, search, and fetch information about an encounter diagnosis.
resource.name: US Core Encounter Diagnosis Profile

resource.description: The US Core Problems and Health Concerns Profile is based upon the core FHIR Condition Resource and meets the  U.S. Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) v2 'Problems' and 'Health Concerns' requirements.  It defines constraints and extensions on the Condition resource for the minimal set of data to record, search, and fetch information about a condition, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that is documented and categorized as a problem or health concern.
resource.name: US Core Problems and Health Concerns Profile

resource.description: Profile for Observations that represent question and answer pairs derived from SDOH surveys/questionnaires.
resource.name: US Core Screening SDOH Item Response Observation Profile

resource.description: Profile for Observations that represent panels derived from SDOH surveys/questionnaires.
resource.name: US Core Screening SDOH Panel Response Observation Profile

resource.description: The US SDOH Core Problems and Health Concerns Profile is based upon the US Core SDOH Problems and Health Concerns Profile and meets the  U.S. Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) v2 SDOH 'Problems/Health Concerns' requirements.  It defines constraints and extensions on the Condition resource for the minimal set of data to record, search, and fetch information about a Social Determinants of Health-related condition.
resource.name: US Core SDOH Problems and Health Concerns Profile

resource.description: Profile for observations that represent question and answer pairs from from surveys/questionnaires.
resource.name: US Core Screening Response2 Observation Profile

resource.description: Profile for observations that represent question and answer pairs from from surveys/questionnaires.
resource.name: US Core Screening Response Observation Profile
